name: Notification
description: A versatile notification system that can display as static badges or animated popup notifications with auto-close functionality.

properties.name: variant
properties.description: Visual style variant of the notification

properties.name: autoClose
properties.description: Whether popup notifications auto-close after timeout

properties.name: showCloseButton
properties.description: Whether to show a close button

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Custom icon HTML (uses default variant icons if null)

properties.name: onClose
properties.description: Callback function executed when notification is closed

methods.name: close
methods.description: Closes the notification and removes it from DOM

methods.name: getElement
methods.description: Returns the DOM element of the notification

staticMethods.name: show
staticMethods.description: Creates and shows a popup notification

events.name: dotbox-notification-close
events.description: Fired when the notification is closed

examples.title: Static Notifications
examples.description: Static notification badges for in-page display
examples.code:
<dotbox-notification message="Operation completed successfully!" variant="success"></dotbox-notification>
<dotbox-notification message="Please check your input" variant="warning"></dotbox-notification>
<dotbox-notification message="An error occurred" variant="danger"></dotbox-notification>
<dotbox-notification message="Here's some information" variant="info"></dotbox-notification>

examples.title: Popup Notifications
examples.code:
<dotbox-notification 
  message="File uploaded successfully!" 
  variant="success" 
  mode="popup" 
  position="top-right"
></dotbox-notification>

examples.title: Custom Timeout and Position
examples.description: Popup with custom timeout and position
examples.code:
<dotbox-notification 
  message="This notification stays for 5 seconds" 
  variant="info" 
  mode="popup" 
  position="bottom-left" 
  timeout="5000"
></dotbox-notification>

examples.title: Non-auto-closing Popup
examples.code:
<dotbox-notification 
  message="Important: Manual action required" 
  variant="warning" 
  mode="popup" 
  auto-close="false" 
  show-close-button="true"
></dotbox-notification>

cssClasses.name: .dotbox-notification
cssClasses.description: Main container for the notification component

cssClasses.name: .dotbox-notification-success
cssClasses.description: Success variant styling with green theme

cssClasses.name: .dotbox-notification-danger
cssClasses.description: Danger variant styling with red theme

cssClasses.name: .dotbox-notification-warning
cssClasses.description: Warning variant styling with yellow theme

cssClasses.name: .dotbox-notification-info
cssClasses.description: Info variant styling with blue theme

cssClasses.description: Show animation state for popup notifications

cssClasses.name: .dotbox-notification-hide

cssClasses.description: Container for popup notifications in each position
